b438e160-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Great location, stuff, accomodation (junior suite preferred location), yummy meal!

b438e162-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Обслуживание замечательное, персонал очень дружелюбный, в ресторане встречают и провожают как дорогих гостей, еда разнообразная и на любой вкус, в отеле чисто, как внутри, так и в парке, есть возможность развлечься по вечерам и познакомиться с культурой Черногории, особенно великолепны народные танцы! Есть один минус- плохая звукоизоляция в номерах корпуса гранд, с соседним номером соединённого внутренней дверью. Отдыхали в сентябре, 2021

b438e164-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Es hat uns sehr gefallen hier zu sein. Es war alles sehr toll Essen , die Anklage, die Zimmer und die Fahrten . Und das Personal sehr freundlich .

b438e166-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Прекрасный отель, отличные номера, приветливый и вежливый персонал, чудесный пляж.

b438e168-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Neocekivano dobar hotel sa odlicnom ponudom hrane i uslugom kao u velikim ljetovalistima. Na samoj obali mora sa hotelskom plazom, a takodje i prelijepim bazenom, barovima i restoranima na bazi all inclusive. Bas sam uzivala. Od srca preporucujem

b438e16a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Отель шикарный,обслуживание на уровне.персонал очень приветливый,еда разнообразная,территория очень красивая,остались довольны!!!

b438e16c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Predivan hotel veoma ljubazno osoblje hogijena na visokom nivou

b438e16e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr nettes fleiiges Personal, tolle saubere Zimmer und das Buffet ob morgens, mittags und abends ist wunderbar und abwechslungsreich

b438e170-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Огромное спасибо за прекрасный отдых! Вкусная и богатая кухня! Спасибо коллективу! Отдельная благодарность Стоянку и Сергею! Спасибо за оздоровление СПА салону. Красивая природа! Вкусный базар! Рига 28.08-11.09.

b438e172-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Все начилось с нашего поселения. Мы приехали очень позно, где-то после 02-03 ночи. Были очень уставшые, по скольку лители в самый розгар COVID-19, и перелёт занял не мало время. На ресепшене нас встретила девушка администратор, увидив наше состояния, она не стала нас долго задержывать, предложыв нам оставить паспорта для регистрации, и пройти в апартаменты. Мы долго не думали, и сразу же согласились. Уже через 20мин. нам вернули паспорта, а в придачу воды и что то из еды я уже не помню. Мы были приятно удевлини, по скольку мы не чего ей не говорили о том что хотим кушать. Но видимо она и так прочла по нашым лицам. После этого через несколько дней я получил травму играя в волей-бол. Они позвонили в больницу, вызвали такси ну вобщем не бросили меня одного с моимы проблемами. По возвращению с больницы, практически весь персонал при виде меня спрашевал меня, как я себя чувствую, и может я нуждаюсь в чём-то. Ребята вот это уровень человечества. Respekt Вам. На счёт питания, незнаю кому как, а как по мне то выбор был большой. А да, ещё спасибо горничным, за постояную чистоту которая была в нас в комнате.

b438e176-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Super Hotel in Toplage direkt am Meer sehr aufmerksames Personal, sehr sauber. Essen und trinken rund um die Uhr , bei AI. Auch mit Kindern sehr zu empfehlen !

b438e178-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr schones Hotel mit ausreichend Liegen im Garten. Die kostenpflichtigen Liegen am Strand haben zwar erst einmal negativ verwundert, bewirken allerdings, dass man immer auch eine Liege bekommt. Die hoteleigene Strandbar ist fur AI Gaste dann auch super gelegen. Das Essen aus uberwiegend lokalen Zutaten war gut, allerdings hatten wir uns abends auch die Moglichkeit eines a-la-card Restaurants gewunscht. Wir konnen dieses Hotel emofehlen

b438e17a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Очень понравилось! Территория ухоженная, везде очень чисто, шведская линия на высоте. Жду следующего отпуска и снова к вам!

b43b5268-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Aradgnz her seyi bulabileceginiz bir market ve diger marketlerden cok ucuz.

b43b526a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Idea Super is a great grocery store for people with allergies. They've got what you need including plant based milks and gluten free food. Try the olive oil from Montenegro. It's make from the olives harvested from 1000 year-old trees. There is a butcher shop where you can consult an expert. All in all, a good experience .

b43b526c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dosta artikala..isteklog roka..kasirke .spore kao puzevi....da dodjes do mesnih preradjevina..trebas da cekac dosta..sve u svemu cista nula.

b43b526e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Do not choose this rental company, unreliable and keen on adding extra charges.

b43b5270-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: AVOID this company if you are not looking for someone to sneak in extra charges without any legitimate reason. Very disappointed with their thrust wordiness and level of service throughout. Go with Avis or a legitimate car rental instead.

b43b5272-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Disappointed When we came to Tivat airport to return the car before our flight, we found the company's representative did not come on time. We called him but he did not answer the phone making us quite nervous. When finally arrived, he examined the car and said it was ok. A week later they charged 260 euros! We tried to call the company for explanation, but they rejected our calls. In WhatsApp they answered they had found scratches after car washing. In the airport we examined the car quite carefully, all together, and there was no such dirt on the car to absolutely hide scratches for 260 euros! Anyway not honest I would not recommend Stella Car Rent A Car (Montenegro) to anyone.

b43d9c50-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very good service. Easy and convenient to rent car. I rented car in Iberostar Bijela Park hotel. Their office is close to reception. You just need to tell that you need car next morning and car will be ready close to hotel. In case you need to extend car rental it can be done very easily, tell via WhatsApp or call or give to their office close to reception.

b4400d56-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Prosecno sve..al za Bijelo Polje, odlicno:)

b4425742-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I recommend this company with a great reputation for design, auditing, engineering, supervision and execution of works in Montenegro.

b4425746-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Самое крупное проектное бюро в Черногории.

b444c840-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Good place of medical reabilitation with healing muds and different procedures. Very friendly staff

b444c842-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Может и старовато здание, все простенько, но по медицинскому значению на высшем уровне.

b444c844-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Predivan i ogroman prostor,divno sreden.Maskenbal u toku i predivno je.Divna muzika,veliki broj maski.

b444c848-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Za manje novca necete nigdje dobit bolju uslugu...

b444c84a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Institut za rehabilitaciju i odmor.Za srcane tegobe, reume,artritis,daunov sindrom...Preporucujem!!!

b444c84e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Очень старое здание, сервис тоже оставляет желать лучшего. Жили за пределами института, собирались сюда ходить на процедуры. Никто толком не говорит по английский, кое как можно объясниться на русском, готовой информации нет вообще. Может надо в другой корпус ходить, это старое здание института и тут, видимо, с момента постройки не меняли ни интерьер ни сотрудников.

b444c850-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Charmant mit professionellem Personal. Essen ist ok, Fruhstuck konnte besser sein.

b444c852-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: It is very authentic, you really feel like you are in a hospitan, not at all like a hotel. You use the same elevators as patients, also those elevators are terrible. They szop at every floor without anyone getting in or out of them. The food is not much better than trash. For 50 euros/person/night it is way overpriced.

b444c854-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Slowly decaying. I've been there 12 years ago and no improvement since that time. Procedures price is lower than somewhere else. Procedures schedule is maintained by always busy stuff with Soviet Union cards, nobody knows about IT systems. Roof of swimming pool is destroyed. One building which belongs to Institute is fully empty. Erosion of old beauty.

b444c856-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mocno mjesto koje vapi za obnovom. Fenomenalna lokacija, ambijent. dostupan

b444c858-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Uzas, uplatio sa porodicom ljetovanje u institutu u kojem je receno da je za turiste sve odvojeno od instituta. Pacijenti i bolnicari iste liftove koriste kao i turisti, koji su dosli odmoriti sa djecom. Sobe i namjestaj u njima ocajan, sve se raspada. Hrana svedski sto pod navodnicima jeste obilna ali, jednolicna. i danas recimo snicle koje ostanu, sutra ih isjeckaju na stanglice i naprave vam novo jelo. Tako od priloga recimo riza sa mrkvom i graskom isto tako sutradan sa tim istim paprike nafiluju, pa opet novo jelo dobijete. Sve u svemu topla preporuka za turiste sa djecom da zaobidu ovo mjesto. Da, i na kraju da ne zaboravim, jedina plaza koja necemu i valja, da se moze reci da ste na more dosli jeste Rafaello plaza na kojoj je jedna lezaljka 6 a suncobran 4 eura. Plaza je jako malena i bolji dio plaze su uzeli za lezaljke. Peskire ispod lezaljki, konobari kluba Rafaello vam ne daju da stavite, jer ovi sto su lezaljke platili, moraju imati otvoren put da se nedaj Boze, nebi provlacili pored peskira. More je cisto do osam sati a poslije kada ude citava plaza ili bolje reci mravinjak, more postaje mutna bara. O blatnoj plazi, bolje da ne pricam. Ko voli nek izvoli. Jednom u Igalo dosao i nikad vise.

b4498330-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Svaka cast za osoblje, doktore, sestre, bravo!

b44bf430-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ima dosta dobrih sadrzaja na repertoaru. Filmovi, koncerti, predstave. Zgradu bi trebalo renovirati i modernizovati.

b44e6530-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: This is the old adress! Please update it.

b44e6532-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Здесь надо побывать, словами сложно передать всю красоту природы.

b44e6534-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Cudowne jezioro Szkoderskie. Miejsce niezwykle piekne i warte zobaczenia. Ornitolodzy maja tu prawdziwy raj ptasi. Jezioro mozna ogladac i z Albanii i z Czarnogory. Na jeziorze sa wyspy, na ktorych znajduja sie zabytkowe monastyry.

b44e6536-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Приятная,лёгкая поездка.Природа супер.Была остановка для купания.После катания по озеру был вкусный ужин.

b44e6538-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Однозначно рекомендую к посещению, несмотря на сложную и серпантинную дорогу.

b44e653a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Predivan proizvod prirode,jezero koje ima zadivljujucu lepotu i okolinu punu inspiracije koju samo priroda moze da priredi

b44e653c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sobrecogedor y maravilloso! La carretera se las trae pero merece la pena.

b44e653e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Bedac w Czarnogorze nie mozna pominac tego jeziora. Przepiekne widoki. Ogromne jezioro. Pelikany. Czysta woda. Szeroka oferta lodzi, malych statkow wycieczkowych. Kajaki. Polecam.

b44e6540-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Gyonyoru hely! Erdemes ellatogatni ide es aztan hajozni egyet a folyon.

b44e6544-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Я була на Скадарському озері з Чорногорської сторони. Вхід у національний парк 4Є для дорослих і 2Є для дітей. А ціни на човники - як домовитесь)) Рекомендую!

b45f0702-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Так случилось, что во время отдыха, у ребёнка случилось очень сильное отравление. За помощью мы обратились в эту больницу. Ребёнка сразу же забрал врач, ему сделали все необходимые анализы и назначили лечение. Пробыли в больнице мы два дня, за это время ребёнок был все время под контролем, медсестра заходила каждый час ( даже ночью) , доктор 3-4 раза в день. Палаты индивидуальные, очень чистые. Есть постельное белье и необходимые средства личной гигиены. Также нас кормили, еда вкусная, давали даже рыбу и мясо. Так что огромное спасибо персоналу больницы за оказанную квалифицированную помощь и хорошее отношение.

b45f0704-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Trafilam do tego szpitala podczas urlopu ze zlamanym palcem. Personel, mimo ze niewiele osob mowilo po angielsku, byl bardzo pomocny. Lekarze super. Trzeba bylo troche poczekac w kolejce, ale otrzymalam fachowa pomoc. Jestem bardzo zadowolona. Dziekuje!

b45f0706-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Meine 19-jahrige Tochter war in Ulcinj und hat schwere Magen-Darm-Grippe mit Fieber bekommen. Dort bekam sie Infusionen weil sie dehydriert war und eine Einweisung falls es nicht besser wird. Sie fuhr um Mitternacht 30km mit Taxi ins KH und dort wurde ihr stationare Aufnahme verweigert. Sie bat die Arztin sie uber die Nacht da zu lassen bis mein Mann sie holt und versicherte ihr, dass sie Geld dabei hat um alles gleich zu bezahlen. Die Arztin sagte ihr, man konne nicht alles fur Geld kaufen. Letztendlich durfte sie im Aufnahmezimmer auf der Liege bis morgens um 6 Uhr bleiben und dann musste sie gehen. Man hat ihr nicht mal die Nadel gezogen. Sie schleppte sich dann zu einem Hostel in der Nahe.

b45f0708-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Katastrofa .nikome ne preporucujem . Ako nemas vezu cekas ceo dan i nista ... Osoblje izuzetno ne ljubazno i drsko. Posebno u hitnom prijemu .

b45f070a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I am only giving one star because I have to! Sadly my son got cut on his leg from glass, a very BIG cut! The Doctor and Nurses there are HORRIBLE.... my son is only 9 and they didnt let us stand next to him while they poured ALCOHOL on his cut which burned him!! The doctor didnt care to look at him, was more concerned of my background etc... After going back to the hotel the next day we where advised to clean the cut, when i opened it I cried so much- they stitched my son with 3 stitches when this cut needed 30!!!! a ANIMAL wouldnt get this type of treatment- and he didnt even let the anesthesia kick in my son screamed because he felt all the pain when getting stitched!! Animals- close this down or get people who CARE for patients that come in there ! DISGUSTING PEOPLE! Just look at the photo and tell me how you would feel if you saw this type of job done on YOUR child

b463c1f0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Laboratorija - organizacija ista ko prije 20 godina. ceka se broj, stignem deveti, dobijem broj 38. u doba pandemije niko ne drzi distancu, idealni uslovi da se prenese bilo koji virus. Zar nema nikoga u menadzmentu ambulante da nesto promjeni zar ne vide da ovo ne funkcionise kako treba Zar nema drugih mogucnosti i ideja da se ova sramota zamjeni necim boljim ili barem pokusa WC i prostorija za urin je neuslovna... Jedino bih dao pet zvjezdica svim medicinskim sestrama jer su zaista ljubazne i imaju zivaca da se bore sa ovim okruzenjem i nervoznim pacijentima koji ih napadaju sa svih strana. Ambulanta bi trebala da ima security koji bi odrzavao neki red i sigurnost radnika. uglavnom sve osude menadzmentu doma zdravlja na losoj organizaciji. mijenjate nesto ili idite sa svojih radnih mjesta za koje vas placamo pa bilo to i bijedno kao sto jeste. ima ko hoce da nesto promjeni i radi ako vi necete. sramota!

b46632f2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The cleanest and most organized Medical institution in Montenegro. Staff can be a bit edgy but at the end staff is profetional and good.

b46632f4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Сдавали тест пцр. Приехали к 7:30, очередь стояли до 9:30, сдали бесплатно. Паспорт там копируют, оплата налога отеля по факту не спросили. С собой была распечатка от букинга,ее мельком глянул охранник, но если бы ее не показали , никто бы и не спросил. Результат забрать можно там же после 17:00

b46632f6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: What to do, if you want a free PCR here: - you need to take the queue at 6am, no later - they starting make PCR for MNE citizens out of turn from 8-9am - be careful, because you can conflict with locals due to the confusion in the queue between locals vs foreigners We have waited from 7am till 10:40am for a free PCR.

b46632f8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Записались заранее и приехали ровно в 7 утра. Уже была большая очередь. Пцр сдали только в 11. Всех местных необходимо пропускать без очереди

b46632fa-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Got a free PCR test here. Bring your passport and your proof of tourist tax (your accomodation should provide this to you) 1) Turn up anywhere between 6-8am. Earlier the better but there’s no line system 2) Security will take your passport with around 10 others at a time. It will be returned with a photocopy. 3) Line up, there’s only one testing station. We waited around 90 minutes. 4) Hand over your passport copy & tourist tax receipt. Get tested - it was gentle and they were friendly. 5) Head back the next day same time for your results. Rumours said it was available the same day, we went 3 times and our results weren’t ready, but maybe if you mention it at testing it’ll be ok. You are given a printed PCR test which is accepted & checked at the border control.

b46632fc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Я не знаю, какое качество медицинских услуг в этом центре, но для того, чтобы сдать тест на covid, нам, туристам, надо прибыть в 7:30 утра, записаться и стать в очередь. Сообщаю это всем, кому это необходимо. А мы прибыли в 9:30, нам сказали, что только завтра с утра мы можем сделать тест, и будет он готов в 17 часов. Очень не удобно. Пришлось ехать в частную лабораторию, где тест стоит 49 евро.

b46632fe-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dosli smo na COVID testiranje 10 minuta do 07 sati, testiranje je trebalo poceti u 7,30, krenulo je 15 minuta kasnije, na red smo tek stigli u 9 sati. Prednost imaju domaci drzavljani. Usluga je spora i ne organizirana.

b4663300-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Je deconseille fortement cet etablissement ! Personnel soignant incompetent et inhospitalier...

b4663302-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The hospital offers free covid tests to tourists. For that, you need to arrive between 7:30 and 8:30 and get in the line. Locals from Montenegro will get preference on the line. You will need to show a receipt that your hotel payed the tourism fee, don’t forget to print it and also bring your passport. Results are ready in the same day, but due to the line is better to pick it up at 7:30pm or on the next day.

b4663304-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Na zakazan termin smo cekali red, a sestra na prijemu je objsnila da je to zbog nedostatka ljekara.

b4663306-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: COVID tests are performed free of charge for tourists There is a line outside and you have to wait in the sun for two and a half hours The results arrive on the evening of the same day and can only be given on physical arrival at the hospital Which of course is especially nonsense in 2021 Not an easy experience

Vi niste doktori vi ste kasapi i po tome ste poznati. Za vreme korone ko god je dosao tu odatle izasao nije . Umiru vam mladi ljudi ja sam tu oca izgubio sa 56 godina niti pio niti pusio ,pa strica , sram vas bilo . Pogledajte u regionu isto ljudi umiru , ali niti manje drzave niti vece smrtnosti , ali znaju i da ih lece i da daju odgovarajucu terapiju i da prate pacijente ,vi bre necete da obideze pacijente jer ste lencuge jedne Vi ste jedno DNO .

b46d5ef0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dobili preporuku da idemo na KAFU u DELTA CITY ( IZJAVA ZASTITNIKA PRAVA PACIJENATA KC CG 09.07.19) DOBRA ZASTITA AKO NEMATE PARA...

b46d5ef2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ja imam jedno lijepo iskustvo sto se tice osoblja ove klinike a najvise bih pohvalio sestru Sladanu.

b46d5ef4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Moze to przesada, ze fantastyczne, ale wspominam je (mimo choroby) bardzo dobrze. Po wyczynach na Chorwacji i w Czarnogorze - jednego dnia w gorach, nastepnego nad morzem i tak na okraglo - serce odmowilo mi posluszenstwa i zdecydowalo sie na 30 uderzen na minute. Mimo zastrzykow adrenaliny ani myslalo przyspieszyc. Karetka przewiozla mnie ze Swietego Stefana do Podgoricy ( tu uczucia mieszane - transport 1300 euro) do Centralnej Kliniki. Sala intensywnego nadzoru doskonale wyposazona, nowoczesna aparatura, klimatyzacja, uprzejmi lekarze - sprowadzili z innego oddzialu lekarza znajacego dobrze rosyjski i moglismy swobodnie rozmawiac. Zabieg wmontowania stymulatora takze w pelni profesjonalny. Gorzej nieco po zabiegu, bo - o ile zrozumialem - przeniesiono mnie na sale krotkoterminowa na ktorej lezeli pacjenci na dwie-trzy doby. W trzyosobowej sali 5 lozek, bez klimatyzacji 30 stopni. Lazienka wspolna dla kilku podobnych sal, na dodatek zalana na dobre 2 centymetry - mam nadzieje, ze woda. Na szczescie spedzilem tam tylko noc i poranek. Jak zauwazylem - na innych oddzialach - dla lezacych dluzej, byly znaczenie lepsze warunki bytowe. Kazdy pokoj mial drzwi balkonowe, wychodzace na szeroki taras, ze stolikami, fotelikami i (chyba wszyscy tam pala!) nieodzownymi popielniczkami. O jedzeniu nic nie moge powiedziec, bo w sumie w czasie trzech dni pobytu nic nie jadlem. Inni oczywiscie cos jedli. W sumie - jezeli juz konieczna jest interwencja szpitalna, to ta Klinika jest na pewno najlepsza w promieniu kilkuset kilometrow.

b46d5ef6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Za svaku pohvalu,kompletno osoblje od servirke do doktora. Ljudskost,profesionalizam,...

b47219d6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dok vam se neko javi na telefon mozete da umrete

b47219d8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Lezala sam na hirurgiji dugo.Zelim da pohvalim sve ljekare a najvise doktora i direktora Ivana Ilica.Sve sestre su divne.Servirke ljubazne i usluzne.Hrana odlicna a higijenicarke drze odeljenje besprijekorno cisto.Jedno veliko hvala dr Ilicu i svom osoblju hirurgije.Cesto sam na snimanja skenera zelim da pohvalim i tehnicare i ljekare sa radioloskog.

b47219da-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Pedijatrija. Solidno sredena, higijena nije losa, kao ni hrana, ali odnos prema roditeljima pacijenata jako los. Lekari su ok, no sestre imaju utisak da igraju vazniju ulogu od svih prisutnih, drsko odvovaraju i imaju stav kao da mora covek za sve da ih moli. Stranci, naravno, placaju dodatno, no ni to ne pomaze da se stav popravi, te se gunda za svaki dodatni utroseni materijal kao da ga sestrica placa, a ne ja. Takode odvratan odnos prema strancima koji ih ne razumeju. Pobogu, ljudi strepe nad svojom decom, nije ni meni jasno sta mom detetu rade iako pricamo istim jezikom, a zamislite kako je onima koji vas zaista ne razumeju. Danas je jedna sestrica majci rekla da je ne smara vise. Da li je to profesionalno Verujte, da postoji privatna bolnica, niko od nas ne bi krocio kod vas.

b47219dc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I thought I needed a stitch on my leg after a little accident so I went to this hospital. They have a special entrance for foreigners seeking help with a big sign in English and Russian. We were met by a very nice multi-lingual nurse who immediately called a doctor. The whole experience was first class, especially considering zero waiting - unlike it would have been back in the States. I definitely recommend this emergency room if you need help. Of course you better have insurance - my total bill was 370 euros.

b47219e0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I definitely recommend this hospital. This year I had an urgent medical issue and went to Kotor hospital. There is a separate reception for foreign patients and it was very fast and easy to get to the doctor. The lady from reception was with me during the medical examination and translated everything to English. After coming back home I talked to my doctor about the visit in hospital and prescribed medicines, he said that everything was done correctly.

b47219e2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: From my experience you can ignore the negative reviews. Yes I am a tourist and yes I paid a lot of money but the hospital was very clean, the treatment efficient and fast (with anaesthetic I have to add) the staff friendly. I know this might not apply to Montenegrins who need treatment (although the ones I saw being treated seemed as happy as anyone can be in a hospital waiting room). So what I am saying is if you are a tourist and need medical help don’t worry about these hospital reviews the hospital is good. Just have a reliable credit card and don’t forget your passport !

b47219e4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ужасная больница. Делают все без наркоза. Отношение как к куску мяса. При это цены для иностранцев раз в 5 выше чем для местных. Прием 120 евро, узи 80 евро.

b476d4c0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ova bolnica je sramota za drzavu i svakog covjeka koji zivi u njoj!Otac mi je bio u ovoj bolnici u februaru 2021.na lijecenju 15 dana..Vezali su ga za krevet,maltretirali i otpustili sa nezalijecenom upalom pluca.Kada je vracen kolima hitne pomoci,bio je bez cebeta na nosilima,iako smo donijeli 2 cebeta u bolnicu,poslali su ga ,totalno opijenog sedativima, bio je vise mrtav nego ziv,u puno gorem stanju nego prije,da smo u nekoj drugoj drzavi neko bi snosio odgovornost za ovo nedjelo i zlocin..Poslali su ga.bez pratnje ,samo sa vozacem i kada je dosao na odrediste,kolima hitne,tj.kuci,vozacu je ispao sa nosila.Nedugo potom je umro.Sta reci nakon svega i kome se zalitiOstaviti Bogu da sudi,jer sve se ovo negdje pise...Ne saljite u tu bolnicu nikoga svoga,ako ga imalo volite,za Boga miloga,bice u gorem stanju nego prije! Nek je na savjesti direktoru bolnice i doktorici koja ga je lijecila,ako ovo procita,prepoznace se vrlo dobro!!

b476d4c2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nazalost , neke medicinske sestre su jako nekulturne,nepravedne izuzetak nekih, a sto se tice Doktora oni su za pohvalu ,bravo samo nastavite tako...

b476d4c4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ein Notfall hat uns hergebracht, eine langere Odyssee zum Parken und dann durch endlose Flure - aber uns wurde gut und freundlich geholfen. Professionelles Personal macht offensichtlich das Beste aus dem, was da ist - was halt nicht viel und v.a. nicht sehr modern ist. Aber eine einfache Platzwunde konnte hier gut versorgt werden.

b476d4c6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Odlicna bolnica. Visoko profesionalno i ljubazno osoblje. Sve u svemu veoma kvalitetna zdravstvena ustanova.

b476d4c8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sve pohvale za Bolnicu Risan,najbolji ste

b476d4ca-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sve pohvale za osoblje bolnice Risan...zaista ste najbolji...

b476d4ce-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Totalni neprofesionalizam, neznanje ,nezainteresovanost, nestrucnost. Medicina se ne upisuje zbog titule i kompleksa, doktori bi trebali da budu humanisti, a tamo sam upoznala samo kasape, koji su totalno nezainteresovani za svoje pacijente. Medicinsko osoblje je jos gore, najgore. Prema ljudskim zivotima se odnose na najgori moguci nacin, tj.ne odnose se uopste. Funkcionisu po principu ako se sjete -sjete za terapiju, ili kada je pomijasaju nikome nista, jedan zivot vise-manje ne znaci puno, planeta je ionako pretrpana(mislim da se tom logikom vode).Pacijenti dolaze tamo u nadi da ce biti izlijeceni, a vracaju ih da ih sa smrtovnicom. Uslove u bolnici ne zelim da komentarisem, svima ce biti jasno prvi put kada kroce u tu tugu od kasapnice, posto je to sve sem bolnica, javasluk totlani. I jos se zale kako su im palte male, Kako rade i preplaceni su.

b476d4d0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Thank you very much for excellent treatment of my wife's broken wrist and little finger! After two weeks the bones are still on place and no surgery is necessary.

b476d4d2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Lose namestili gips, posle 12 dana snimio ponovo sve isto. Operacija potrebna.

b476d4d4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Bolnica sa dobrim strucnim kadrom. ali godinama sa losim upravljacki partijskim kadrom koji je giedao svoje interese. nadamo se da je krenulo na bolje i da ce novo rukovodstvo raditi u interesu struke i gradana.

b476d4d6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Jad i bijeda. Zelim svim svojim neprijateljima da zavrse tamo na lijecenju. Nece docekati jutro. Sramota za ovu drzavu. Ali to i nije sve, Kbc Podgorica je jos veci javasluk. Zelim nam srecno novo jutro Crnogorci, pored ovakvih bolnica nece nas ostat ni 100000 za koju godinu...

b47945c0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Neprofesionalni i ocajni. Nece da dodju. Neljubazni. Tuzno. Ne znam za sta ih placamo samo... U CG visa sila cuva ove kukale ljude i njihovo zdravlje. Sto se tice zdravstvenih radnika, cast izuzecima, samo neka ste zdravo. Zovem ih, niko se ne javlja, dodjem sa covjekom od 80 i kusur godina ispred hitne, oni svi sjede. Toliko neprofesionalizma do bola. Ja ih pitam sto se niko ne javi na telefon, oni se sprdaju i smiju. I meni je to jako smijesno zaista... Nadam se iskreno da cete se popraviti u narednom periodu, jer nismo mi tu zbog vas, nego vi zbog nas. Budite malo humani. Imali ste na pocetku valjda neku zakletvu, ako je uopste iko vise i postuje. Da dodam jos, ne mogu grijesiti dusu, svaka cast za doktore, razumijem da svakakvi ljudi dolaze. Medutim ako sam ja super korektna i ljubazna ne vidim potrebu da se sestre tako brecaju i nevaspitano ponasaju. Molim vas, poruka za medicinske sestre, malo vise ljubaznosti i vjerujem da ce i ljudi biti jos ljubazniji. Kad se tako nadrkano brecate, logicno da nece niko da vas trpi, pa to tamo kuci de ste naucile. Opet, cast izuzecima!

b47945c4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Kvalitet usluge je na nivou ostalih zdravstvenih ustanova u Crnoj Gori.

b47b8fb0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Приятный спокойный отель в центре Будвы, но вдали от городского шума. Вкусные завтраки, приветливый персонал, мало постояльцев.

b47b8fb2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Wir haben Anfang September einige Tage im Hotel Kadmo Urlaub gemacht. Dieses Hotel hat uns gefallen, da es als kleiner, sehr freundlicher Familienbetrieb vorgestellt wurde. Wir hatten Halbpension gebucht und freuten uns nach unserer Ankunft auf ein tolles 3 Gang Menu. Was auf den Tisch kam war weder 3Gang noch lecker. Es gab eine kleine Vorspeise und ein lauwarmes Abendessen ohne Geschmack. Nach drei Tagen haben wir dann das Abendessen abbestellt. Ein Mitarbeiter sagte uns dass sie im Moment keinen Koch haben und das Essen durch einen Lieferdienst aus den umliegenden Lokalen beziehen. Das war alles sehr frustrierend und man fragt sich, wie man in so einer Situation seinen Gasten Halbpension verkaufen kann. Wir konnen nur hoffen, das sich die Situation in diesem Hotel rasch wieder normalisiert.

b47b8fb4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Free parking lot, nice and clean rooms, friendly staff. Nebojsa and Petar, you are the best. Thank you for everything.

b47b8fb8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Відпочивали з дружиною в кінці серпня. Дуже чисті та затишні номери. Прекрасне обслуговування та ставлення працівників готелю. Рекомендую!

b47b8fba-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ein sehr tolles Hotel. Unglaublich freundliche und kundenorientierte Mitarbeiter, die sehr aufmerksam und herzlich sind. Zudem sehr leckeres Fruhstuck und ein schoner, ruhiger Poolbereich. Das Hotel ist in einer ruhigen Seitenstrae und dennoch sind Restaurants und der Strand zu Fu gut zu erreichen. Danke auch fur die tollen Restaurant Empfehlungen! Wir wurden uns immer wieder fur dieses Hotel entscheiden!

b47b8fbc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Peccato per l'ubicazione in mezzo alle abitazioni, purtroppo ho trovato il frigo completamente vuoto!! Inconcepibile in un 4 stelle!!!

b47b8fbe-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Camere curate, parcare subterana, strada ingusta spre hotel. Este primul hotel de 4*, unde la micul dejun ii ofera cafea la plic (3 in 1) pe care trebuie sa o faci tu singur, Incredibil! Nu exista nici o modalitate de a usca prosoapele de plaja.( suport ).

b47b8fc0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Секоја чест предобар хотел перфектен персонал

b48071b4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Beautiful and amazing top floor. Was Food poison as I was eating raw scrimps as starter. 3-4 days on my vacation was destroyed.

b48071ba-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ездили сюда, чтобы посетить СПА. Я была впервые. Очень всё симпотично, открыт всем для посещения. Вход на весь день стоит 20 евро, в сезон, зимой 15 евро. Полотенца, тапочки и халаты выдают. Тут есть большой бассейн, маленький лягушатник для малышей, джакузи большой с бурболками и купель с холодной водой. А так же две бани: хамам и сауна 80 градусов, и соляная комната. В раздевалке, она конечно маленькая, есть два туалета и огромная душевая для двух человек. Так же душ есть везле бассейна и возле бань. Все чисто и аккуратно, можно заказать небольшой перекус прямо на место. Стоят шезлонги и столики. Мне понравилось иногда можно разнообразить свой досуг. А после СПА сидели в ресторане, который находится на крыше и смотрели красивый закат. Кормят вкусно.

b48071c2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Wonderful place. Sea wiev is amazing,beach bar is perfect for young people. They have a swimming pool,good for kids,too.

b48071c8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Beautiful and amazing top floor. Was Food poison as I was eating raw scrimps as starter. 3-4 days on my vacation was destroyed.

b48071d6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Wonderful place. Sea wiev is amazing,beach bar is perfect for young people. They have a swimming pool,good for kids,too.

b4852ca2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very small mall, apart from Fashion & Friends and few cosmetic shops nothing more too see.

b4852ca4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Полноценный Торговый Центр. Три этажа, лифт. Есть тренажёрный зал, салон красоты, зона отдыха для детей. Фуд-корт. Парковка бесплатная на 1 час.

b4852cac-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Небольшой торговый центр с адекватными ценами

b4852cae-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Цены на продукты очень приятные, обувь и одежда дороговато. Парковка 1€ час, но при покупке в супере и чеком на руках, можно сэкономить. 1 час парки при наличии чека на 10€ бесплатно, соответственно 2часа на 20€ бесплатно.

b4852cb2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Not a good hotel.. Just one star maybe.. The door of bathroom wasn't closing..shower wasn't working properly.. The electric switch wasn't working either. The bed wasn't comfortable.. I don't recommend..

b4852cb4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: к сожалению стоимость и качество рестарана в 2021 году испортились

b4852cb8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Отличное место, хорошая кухня и очень приятные цены! Рекомендую!!!

b4852cba-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Not too bad given the 2 stars. Actually better than most 3 or 4 star hotels to be honest

b4852cbc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Гуляли вечером, и зашли сюда поужинать. На момент 2018 года, когда мы там были, был норм ресторанчик. Но нужно понимать что черногорский сервис очень своеобразный, бегать за вами не будут))

b4852cc0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The food is average, as well as a service.

b4852cc2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Az etterem reszben voltunk, zero kola helyett simat hoztak. Rendeltunk egy tengeri Noe etelt, helyette kihoztak egy tanyer kagylot. Teljesen mas etelrol van szo. Eloetelnek se adnam oda senkinek. Soha tobbet nem jovunk meg a kozelebe se az etteremnek :)

b4852cc6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Отель маленький. Всё чистое, но есть заштопанное белье, полотенце. Каждый день убирают и меняют полотенца. Кондиционер рабочий. Если фен был не рабочий, то принесли ещё один рабочий. С сантехникой проблемы, старенькое, хоть и рабочее. На рецепшине очень приятные девочки, всегда откликаются на просьбу. Завтраки стандартные: омлет, яичница, колбаски, бекон, сыры, фрукты... С пониманием русского языка проблем не было. На 0 этаже ресторан, где можно пообедать. Идеальное сочетание цена-качество.

b489e790-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Also, ich kann mir hier kein Urteil erlauben. Uns hat es gefallen, wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder!

b489e796-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Veeeeeeeliko za divan hotel i osoblje!

b489e79a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Doskonale na spokojny wypoczynek. Bezp. Przy plazy. Jedzenie ok.warto wziac all inclusive bo do sklepu ok 2km.

b489e79c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Jestem tym hotelu we wrzesniu, oceniam to na 5+ , luksusowe pokoje rodzinne skladajace sie wlasciwie z dwoch odrebnych pokoi, jedzenie bardzi dobre i wszystkiego pod dostatkiem, jestem bardzo zadowolona, piekny, duzy kompleks dla osob wymagajacych, polecam z czystym sumieniem, drinki leja sie wszedzie, na plazy, przy basenach, owocow duzo i w ogole jest suuuper

b489e79e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Odmor za dusu o tijelo,sve perfekt

b489e7a0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Jeg var forste gang i July sammen med min familie og det var spndende! Vi havde en rigtig god oplevelse isr med mad. Man skal prove kager, meget lkkert! Tusind tak!

b489e7a2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ne preporucujem osobama bez dece koje bi volele da se odmore. Prema ceni usluga je katastrofna. Hrana = katastrofa. Pecenje stoji nekoliko dana. Nema nekih izbora, jedna te ista hrana se vrti. Kad ste na plazi za jelo nema nikakav izbor. Morate da odete do restorana. Cene su visoke, a ne vredi uopste. Jedino sto je dobro je privatna plaza dje ima manje guzve nego inace na veliku plazu.

b489e7a4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very nice and clean resort. Nice staff, perfect beach... Its paradise

b489e7a6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Unsere Erwartungen an die Aufenthalt bei diesem 4-Sterne Hotel waren schon sehr hoch, v.a. dadurch begrundet, dass wir eine Swim-out Suite gebucht haben (was nicht gerade gunstig war) Leider kam die Enttauschung direkt als wir ins Zimmer reinkommen sind (der Vorgang war nicht gut angebracht, es war dreckig und staubig). Als ich mich an der Rezeption beschwert habe, haben die Mitarbeiter sich nicht mal dafur entschuldigt. Als wir dann zuruck im Zimmer waren, wurde das worauf ich hingewiesen habe, erledigt, aber dann ist ist mir aufgefallen, dass die Terrasse dreckig ist (also wirklich nicht mal gekehrt). Dies habe ich nicht mehr gemeldet und war neugierig, ob es am nachsten Tag aufgeraumt wird, aber leider wieder enttauscht. Sehr schade v a. fur das Geld ist es eine Frechheit.

b48c5894-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dobra staza,kao i kartinzi. Good track and good carts!

b48c589a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Really nice spot for racing. Had a few cart choices. No waiting line. Clean equipment. Friendly employees with affordable prices.

b48c589c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Гарно обладнаний картінг центр. Є карти для дітей, а також кафе для чекаючих. Можна попросити персонал та їздити суто родиною, без інших.

b48ea284-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: не так хорошо, как хотелось бы.

b48ea286-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Rehabilitacija, sportska rehabilitacija, korektivna gimnastika, sportska skolica,Carbofit tretmani, kozmetika, estetika, RMF tretmani su samo dio programa koje nudi nas centar.

b48ea288-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Kupio sam peglu ( kasnije se ispostavilo sa fabrickim felerom ) u decembru prosle godine. Nakon 3 servisa, pa zamjene ( i nova sa fabrickim felerom ), pa opet dvije popravke ( na potpunom novoj pegli ), nisu htjeli da vrate novac ! Jedva sam, posredstvom trzisne inspekcije, i nakon 9 mjeseci bez pegle, uspio da ostvarim nesporno zakonsko pravo, i povratim svoj novac. NIKAD VISE MOJA NOGA NECE KROCITI KOD TIH PREVARANATA ! AKO NEMATA PARA ZA BACANJE, NE KUPUJTE NISTA U KIPS-u, POGOTOVO ELEKTRICNE APARATE !!!

b48ea28c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Divan poslovni prostor. Sve za kucu na jednom mestu.

b48ea28e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Puno,nema sta nema. Samo trgovaca nema nesto za pohvalu za tolki prostor.

b48ea290-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Odusevljena sam i asortimanom i cenama.

b48ea294-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Good enough assortment. The only place where I can found an electricity counter.

b48ea298-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Prodavnica u kojoj mozete kupiti sve za kucu Od igle do lokomotive. Jako ljubazno osoblje i uvek spremno da pomogne izboru.

b4938480-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Amazing school with best facilities for children & teachers!

b4938482-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I hope I will get a chance to attend this school soon. It has always been one of my biggest dreams. I like the way they treat their students, and how they tend to develop their creativity. I can see from pictures, and reviews that It's really good. I can not wait to experience that too !

b4938486-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: help how much does it cost yearly. Never been there but the pictures look nice!

b493848a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Учится сын пятый год, с каждым годом Школа становится ещё лучше, хорошая дисциплина, дружный коллектив!

b493848c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: учатся два сына. нахожу очень адекватным соотношение цены и качества обучения. школа постоянно развивается и каждый следующий год становится лучше. Радует, что подбираются в основном иностранные преподаватели.

b493848e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: A private school which makes you feel like home. Friendly but professional staff, kind but really teaching teachers, and wonderful environment for students. I'm so happy that a school like KSI Montenegro is existing, and my son is having education there..

b4938490-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I've known of this school from ever since it was opened in 2010. Since 2015 I've worked here and learnt about all the many qualities it has to offer. IB is new to this country, but is definitely education for the future. This is why I have decided to enroll my children in KSI Montenegro; for them to be able to learn from an early age how to be open minded, tolerant, caring, respectful, independent, and enthusiastic about their school and learning is priceless. The biggest reward is seeing them smile and being happy to go to school every day.

b4938492-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Great school. My children are happy to study at this school.

b4938494-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: We love this school and so do my kids. Only joy and excitement to go to school every morning. Familial atmosphere, seriousness, professionalism are the key attributes of ksi.

b4938496-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: We pulled my daughter out of the school - she wasn't learning anything.

b495ce70-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I couln't dream of a better place for my birthday!! Everything was perfect!The place is amazing, calm with this little jazzy music, perfect.The food was really good, and well presented in our plate.The wine list was the best I could find in Montenegro.The waiter was so sweet and with our english, was able to understand us with a perfect smile and kindness.The price is correct.Thank you so much again.Do not hesitate, and you will definitely spend a great moment.

b495ce72-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Спасибо, это было отвратительно! Для начала, официант не подходил минут десять, по штрих-коду стоящему на столе нет меню с едой, только напитки. Когда официант все же подошёл, он не захватил с собой меню, а просто спросил, что мы хотим. Меню решили не ждать, а спросили то блюдо, которое знаем и которое везде есть обычно - приганице. На что официант ответил, что уточнит на кухне, есть ли сегодня такое блюдо. Вернулся ещё минут через десять, принес радостную весть — есть. Минут 30 мы ждали приганицы уже не надеясь на счастливый исход и оказались правы: принесли нечто из теста, с невкусным сыром и вообще без меда (он должен подаваться вместе с приганицами). На вопрос где мед, официант сказал, что уточнит на кухне и ушел...вернулся когда мед был уже не нужен. Потом мы ждали когда нас рассчитают... В общем, если вам некуда выкинуть пару часов своей жизни и вы не будете голодны, то можно зайти выпить чай. Но лучше выпить чай дома. Звезда за расположение.

b495ce74-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Preljepo mjesto. Super usluga. Obavezno posjetiti.

b495ce76-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Comparing to other food places near by, this is a 4/10 for breakfast. The waiter was nice and polite.

b495ce78-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Rucak na terasi uz opustajucu muziku je pravo uzivanje. Hrana fantasticna, osoblje jako ljubazno. Sve preporuke!!!

b495ce7a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Razocarana sam. Veoma. Prvi put smo dosli u Bar i ono sto nas je privuklo ovom restoranu jeste lokacija, ambijent i zaista smo ocekivali vrhunsku uslugu. Medutim, hranu smo cekali sat vremena, to ne bi bio toliki problem da nam na sve to konobar nije posluzio navodno: ‘ domaci proizvod kuce ‘ (sir na domacem hljebu) koji pri tom niko nije trazio i na kraju to otkucao na racunu. Racun smo cekali pola sata i doslovno jedva cekali da izademo. Nikada vise! Uzasno iskustvo!

b495ce7c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Один из лучших кофе! Прекрасное место!

b495ce82-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Es war sehr angenehm und schon. Groe Essens Auswahl. Sehr netter und hilfsbereiter Kellner, Namens Luka

b495ce84-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Excellent food and service. We enjoyed our stay with kids who could play on playground next to restaurant.

b495ce86-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Predivno mjesto, ukusna hrana i ljubazno osoblje.

b4983f94-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Radno vreme banke za vreme vanredne situacije

b49cfa60-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Pozytywne wspomnienia z pobytu w hotelu. Barzdzo pomocny personel. Pozdrowienia dla Jelena i Marko

b49cfa62-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nagyon finom a kaja, jo aron es nagyon kedves szemelyzet.

b49cfa66-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mon mari et moi sommes restes 4 nuits dans cet hotel ou tout nous plaisait : chambre tres propre et confortable, douche extra, personnel souriant et attentionne. Nous prenions notre petit dejeuner a l'ombre de leur immense terrasse sous les tilleuls, qui sert egalement de place du village avec tous les habitues venant prendre un cafe ou un verre, et nous avions plaisir a y revenir le soir pour diner ou prendre un dernier verre. Nous avons fait des superbes balades : dans les monts Komovi depuis Etno Selo Stavna, dans les monts Bjelasica (lacs Pesica et Sisko), dans le parc national Prokletije (vallees de Vusanje et Grebaje) et autour de Cakor au-dessus de Murino. Cet hotel merite que l'on s'y attarde pour sillonner la region !

b49cfa68-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Zbog najlepseg hlada u CG i zbog najljubaznijeg osoblja...Labovic rekla bih da je prezime konobara

b49cfa6a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very friendly people, Wifi is good and rooms are clean. I recommend.

b49cfa6c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Simple and a bit outdated. Very kind staff. Average meals.

b49cfa70-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: 5 zvezdica jer mi se mesto jako svidelo. Bio sam u vreme korone, ali i pored male posecenost sve je bilo u funkciji i na nivou. Osoblje pogotovu. Prijatna atmosfera, cistoca, jednostavnost, pristupacne cene... Svaka preporuka.

b49cfa72-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Hotel ima odlican polozaj..sobe su prostrane..ciste..mirno je hrana je odlicna..osoblje ljubazno..okolina je divna priroda..za svaku preporuku The hotel has a great location..the rooms are spacious.. clean..the peaceful food is excellent..the atmosphere is kind .. the surroundings are wonderful nature..for every recommendation

b4a1b554-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very nice and simple hotel in a rather remote location. Equipment is simple and got a bit into age but the location is beautiful and the staff very friendly and supportive to let you have a good time and stay! They even met our special wishes for breakfast. Also very Good breakfast with great views. Only few options but everything was very good and tasty- great quality!

b4a1b556-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nice Location down the bay. The appartement give me personally the feeling of a Boat cabin. Kind people. Had some overnight thunderstorm which made very special effects on the water. That was a fabulous show. Thank you.

b4a1b558-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Prelepo mesto, dobri domacini. Vec treci put letujemo kod nase divne Nade.

b4a1b55c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Izuzetno prijatno mesto , sve preporuke od apartmana koji su predivno uradjeni do pogleda na samo more koje je na dlanu. Kao i hrana koja je fenomenalna i domaca pre svega. Domacini su prijatni , zasluzuje cistu 10ku! Preporuka obavezno posetiti!

b4a1b55e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Izuzetna ljubaznost i luksuzna komunikacija sa gostima. Osoblje fenomenalno, vlasnici druzeljubivi. Sam pogled na more je izvanredan, toliko umiri coveka da pozeli ceo zivot ostati tamo Nadina kuhinja je fantasticna, sta god smo pozeleli pripremila nam je. kad god budemo odabrali Crnu Goru za letovanje, sigurnaa sam da cemo svratiti u ovaj apartman ukoliko odaberete ove apartmane, obavezno izljubite kucu Viki umesto mene

b4a1b560-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Przepiekne i ciche miejsce, idealne na wypoczynek, obsluga bardzo mila i pogodna

b4a1b562-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Unterkunft mit allem, was man fur einen erholsamen Urlaub braucht. Tolles Zimmer, Fruhstuck frisch nach Wunsch zubereitet ( Abendessen auch), eigener Bereich mit Sonnenliegen und Schirmen. Sehr freundliches und aufmerksames Personal. Und Gastfreundschaft wird hier gelebt. Danke an Nada, Miro und das ganze Personal.

b4a1b564-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Beautiful hotel with an immaculate ocean view. Welcoming staff and great service.

b4a1b566-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Vrlo neobican i simpatican dizajn enterijera, u kojem se zaista osjecate kao da ste u kabini nekog broda ili kruzera, a pogled sa terase je kao pogled sa palube... Domacini su jako ljubazni... Imaju dva preslatka psa.. Viki i Mito.. Viki nas je usvojila Nadamo se da cemo opet doci da uzivamo u kupanju i suncanju, jer nazalost nas vrijeme nije posluzilo.

b4a1b568-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr schone Lage, sehr gutes Essen. Die Inhaberin ist eine super tolle Person. Die Unterkunft empfehlenswert

b4a1b56a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Traumhafte Lage. Nette Gastgeber und super Fruhstuck

b4a69750-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr schones und sauberes Hotel direkt an der Fussgangerzone von Stari Bar. Das Zimmer war ebenfalls sauber und gross mit Balkon zur Fussgangerzone mit Sicht auf die Burgmauern. Sehr nettes und hilfsbereites Personal.

b4a69754-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ottima struttura, luogo particolare e caratteristico... Vichi sempre presente e gentilissima

b4a69756-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Apartament, restauracja i Stary Bar stanowia nieodlaczna jednosc. Miejsce, w ktorym warto sie zatrzymac i poddac sie klimatowi miejsca. Komfortowy apartament, restauracja z nietuzinkowa kuchnia (sery i owoce morza prima sort) oraz bliskosc zabytkow zachwycaja. Calosc wienczy charyzmatyczna i wielce pomocna wlascicielka:)

b4a69758-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Lovely host, beautiful old town, great and cute restaurants

b4adc342-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Food is so delicious in this place, they make good combinations and prices are totally ok for this good meal, service also good and fast!

b4adc34c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Super mesto sa dnevnim menijem. Izbor izmedju 4-5 vrsta jela.

b4adc34e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Zao mi je sto nisam procitala recenzije pre dolaska u hotel.Lose iskustvo.To sto su ponudili i prikazali na slikama nije ni deseti deo krsa koji je tamo stvaran.Staro,neuredno tj. nesredjeno.Terase samo sto ne otpadnu nebezbedno za malu decu.Hrana jednolicna i za moj ukus nedovoljno obradena.Ne iskoristena hrana sutradan doradjena u drugom obliku.Parkinga nema ni toliko da se istovare stvari.Velika buka od prolaznika koji sednu na terasu pri povratku iz nocnog zivota u 4-5 h Sve u svemu lose.

b4adc350-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Na slikama nude jedno,u stvarnosti sasvim drugacije,renovirani deo hotela se raspada. Kupatila nemaju vrata na tus kabinama,a ona sto imaju moras paziti da ne otpadnu i da ne napravis poplavu u kupatilu.Nema parking,moras stvari da vuces po ulici do kola. Zali boze para koje sam dao. Sto se tice higijene,ona je jedino prelazna ocena,svaki dan cisti peskir i posteljinu menjaju po potrebi.

b4adc352-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Фантастично.Љубазни, педантни, храна и особље ресторана чиста 10!

b4b00d30-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nisam u losi. Dobro rade svoj posao. Bolje obavjestavaju gradane o dogadajima i opstini nego gradska televizija. Svaka cast nadaleko poznati Radio Bijelo Polje.

b4b27e30-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Kad sam otvarao racun rekli su : Otvaranje i odrzavanje je besplatno i uvijek ce biti. Nije dugo potrajalo...

b4b27e32-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Really one of the best Mne banks. They opened my an account, even at that time I didn’t have any citizenship of mne. Already use services 4 years. They are friendly and working on Saturday, lines to the office exist but not like to others(max 3 people ). Really fast working, even aboard. After all main difference is, that I don’t need to pay extra for list with my transactions, for to get/put money in ATM, for getting bill with available sum from ATM also free. That is really rare for this country. Moreover, ATM on German, eng, Rus- research convenient.

b4b4c834-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: 30.12.2019 oko 11 sati u Kotoru nikog nije bilo na cijelom 1. spratu, a sat kasnije u Tivtu nije bilo nikog kome bi mogla da se prijavi steta. Na pitanje kad se vracaju, odgovor je bio - za pola sata, ali ne znaju da li ce uopste danas doci! Treba li jos sta da se kaze.

b4b9aa22-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Iz naseg iskustva se pokazalo, da je isto biti neosiguran ili se osigurati sa Lovcen Osiguranjem, kada je u pitanju putno osiguranje. Neprofesionalan servis prije svega, na kraju novac nije refundiran, iako je u nasem slucaju bilo krajnje jasno da je novac za lijecenje u inostranstvu morao biti refundiran. Jednostavno, kada se radi o putnom osiguranju, sto dalje od ovog osiguravajuceg drustva, osim ako ne mislite da se razvlacite po sudovima koji i sami znamo kakvi su. Sa ostalim njihovim uslugama, osim osiguranja automobila, na svu srecu nisam imao nikakvih iskustava.

b4bbf412-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mondensko, sterilno, dosta kica, preskupa i los espreso u staklenim, hladnim, soljama i ne daju racune sa kjuarkodom

b4bbf414-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Predivno ,bajkovito,svesredeno do maksimuma,prijatna atmosvera,jedina mana kad dodete,ne zelite da odete

b4bbf418-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Очень приятное место. Аналог порта Монтенегро. Очень чисто, тихо, душевно.

b4bbf41a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Prelepo, svaka cast za Crnu Goru da ima u ponudi ovakav koncept turizma. Sve pohvale.

b4bbf41c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Lustica bay is a lovely place, both regarding the nature, as well as the buildings. The style is very natural, everything seems as if it has always been there, as if it belongs there, although the entire place was built a few years ago out of a rocky and desert place. Ice cream at bakery Davidovic is the best.

b4bbf41e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mlada arhitektura za malo vremena egipatski seik finansirao

b4be6510-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr gut ausgestattetes geraumiges Zimmer und Nasszelle. Sehr sauber. Klimatisiert. Freundliches, zuvorkommendes Personal. Das Fruhstucksbuffet war vielfaltig und in der Qualitat wirklich gut. WLAN funktionierte gut. Man parkt in einer verschlossenen Tiefgarage. Hier stimmt das Preis- Leistungsverhaltnis.

b4be6512-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Bello, nuovo, confortevole e a due passi dal centro. Abbiamo trascorso una sola notte ma l’esperienza e stata impeccabile. Comodo anche il parcheggio coperto e chiuso dell’hotel.

b4be6514-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Vrh, prvi put u zivotu sam spavao u butiku, sa pogledom na neki hodnik. Imao je i svoj izlog

b4c0d610-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Чисто, уютно, доброжелательный персонал, хорошая кухня, чистый и большой пляж

b4c0d614-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Супер отель, супер пляж, очень крутой сервис и вежливые рабочие

b4c0d616-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Lovely experience at their restaurant, definitly worth going back

b4c0d618-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Мекка роскоши среднего класса, обслуживание на уровне, во всяком случае в казино. Наверно лучший отель на побережье, свой пляж, несколько бассейнов.

b4c0d61c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Bravooo. Hotel zasluzuje 5. Svaka pohvala za hotel a posebno za zaposlene na svim pozicijama koji su ljubazni i kulturni . BRAVO.

b4c0d622-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Super Hotel mit Seesicht, sehr ruhig und schone Bucht, das Wasser ist glasklar!

b4c0d628-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Location and the beach are nice. Room are fine but balcony doors need fixing in 2 rooms we used, they are old and not easy to operate. Service in restoran is slow and food from A la carte restoran was mediocre, not on the leve of other 5 star hotels in MNE...

b4c0d62a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Otel cok keyifli. Calsanlar cok misafirperver ve yardmc oluyorlar. BUDVA da en cok taksi terorune dikkat etmeniz gerekir dolayisiyla Otelden taksi cagrmaniz cok iyi olacaktr cunku Otel size ozel uygun taksiler ayarlyor. Otelin casinosu cok keyifli degil dolayisiyla 1 kere gittim. Otelin konumu fena degil.

b4c0d62c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Apsolutna preporuka za odmor i uzivanje. Hotelska plaza i bazen, pored usluga koje su na raspolaganju je sve sto je coveku potrebno za prikupljanje dobre energije i relaksaciju.

b4c0d62e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Izuzetna lokacija, plaza, osoblje, jedna od najlepsih plazi i hotel koji je veoma blizu drugim atrakcijama a opet izolovan od guzve i buke. Decija zona ove godine dobija najvecu pohvalu, zahvaljujuci nasoj dragoj Zlatiji i Mirni, devojke koje svaki dan sa osmehom na licu docekuju decu, koja im takodje trce u zagrljaj. Profesionalne, humane, emotivne, kreativne, zaista osobe kod koje roditelji sa zadovoljstvom ostavljaju decu. Svaka cast i jedva cekamo da se vidimo i druzimo ponovo. Veliko Srce za Kids team, za nasu predivnu Danijelu iz restorana, i za koletktiv Hotela Maestral.

b4c32000-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: You can book a retreat. Do yoga eat healthy and there you go. But Mahakala is a whole different level. You don't book a retreat. You book a journey for yourself. To connect. To feel. To face fears. To get yourself to a higher level. But you need to do something, have a open mind. Trust and go with it. And you will find yourself healed. Mahakala offers more. Go and gift yourself this, you deserve it! Much credits also to Emma and Amanda for being amazing teachers. and Marijana for making this retreat perfect in a lot of ways.

b4c32002-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: That was a magical experience! I loved the retreat and all the team! At Mahakala place you can be truly yourself! It’s not possible to explain in words all my impressions about this place..the wild woman’s retreat that I participated was something unique! I would love to go there again and again, every year.. the views from the retreat are breathtaking! People coming there-real! Who listen to you, looking in your eyes and aren’t judging..so, I recommend this place 100%!! Kisses and hugs to all of you Mahakala team and see you soon!

b4c32004-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mahakala was a gorgeous experience. It was beyond perfect. I met so many beautiful souls over there. The workshops were very well chosen, the yoga teacher was great and I loved doing yoga with her. I also adored the Hosts Marijana and Vesna, a beautiful mother-daughter-duo and they were always around for questions and any needs. The food was vegan and delicious and the view from the location was stunning. There's nothing I could complain about.

b4c32006-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mahakala Center is a wonderful place, full of magic. I felt right away like I was coming home. The Wild Women Retreat was one of the most beautiful experiences I had in my life. I learned so much about the female body and the cycle. I was able to let go of so much. I overcame so many fears. I was able to celebrate my period for the first time in my life. Without pain. The week at the Mahakala Center was balm for my soul. I feel much more connected to myself now, to my body, to my soul. Marijanna is a warm, wonderful, admirable and inspiring woman. I am so grateful for everything. The whole team was so great and loving. I have never eaten better in my life. Everything was homemade and freshly prepared. There was nothing lacking. The program was perfect and the workshops so interesting and healing at the same time. I feel so refreshed, calm and full of self love. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for this unforgettable week! I will DEFINITELY come again <3

b4c32008-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Thank you so much for the wonderful time here! I learned so much about me and womanhood. I will never forget this week and the beautiful retreat ¦ and also Marijana, the owner is one of the most heart warming persons i’ve ever met!

b4c3200a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: A place made with much love. The place is magical, the classes were great and give more of a wholesome perspective to yoga. Our teachers had a lot of passion for yoga, teaching the right way, and beautiful souls to get to know. The food is the most mindful food I ate, and in addition there is a lot of time and activities to connect with the people. By the end of it we felt like a relaxed, healthy, happy family.

b4c3200c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: From where and where to start, when there is neither a beginning nor an end after retreat at the Mahakala Center. Buljarice, the place where is the Mahakala, is the place of the wind rose that takes away all the bad from us / around us and provides access to everything good, positive, absolutely conscious. Coming to the center, at the same moment, it is as I have entered into another dimension of reality in which there is absolute peace, invulnerable acceptance, sincere attention focused on you as a person as well as on every part of your body. At the same time, you lose the notion of time (time as time and time as an external influence through the dance of Rain, Sun and Clouds thanks to the Wind, and you are on Earth all the time). Edita's spontaneous sincerity, Rhi's calmness, stability and security, Sara's awareness, Marijana's open approach to everything and everyone, Vesna's gleam in her eyes enabled an unforgettable stay with delicious food, wonderfully led yoga classes and daily activities that showed us that nature are We “The power is here now” by Alexia Chellun

b4c3200e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Compliments to the host, the yoga teacher and the staff. I had such a great experience, ate healthy for one week and connected with wonderful people. Try this yoga retreat center if you want: - to have clean healthy tasty food and nutritional information - feel connection, acceptance, appreciation and willingness - relax and deconnect from compulsive digital use - learn and practice quality and diverse yoga - have spectacular view over mountains and the sea - enjoy walks, the beach, being taken care of, smiles Thank you

b4c32010-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I can not recommend Mahakala Center enough. This space is so nourishing and loving, you arrive and you feel immediately at home. The food is amazing, the owners Vesna and Marijana has a lot of wisdom to share about food, herbs and nourishment. This was very inspiring for me. The yoga practice and the workshops invited me back home into my body and I got some well needed rest, yet a lot of new energy and inspiration. And the whole week with activities, free time, WS and classes unfolded perfectly. It was truly a beautiful experience, which I am very thankful for.

b4c32012-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: This retreat was exactly what I needed. I cannot put into words how much I felt during the week. So many wow-moments everyday. So perfectly curated and well taught Yoga lessons. The warmest welcome, the hardest goodbye. I cant wait to be back. I love you Mahakala. Thank you for feeling inner peace and pure happiness.

b4c32014-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: We just can’t rate Mahakala highly enough! We were fortunate enough to participate in this exceptional yoga retreat late October/early November 2020 at the sympathetically constructed Mahakala Yoga Centre, Montenegro. Everyday we experienced personally rewarding yoga in a mixed ability class overlooking the bay, with the backdrop of mountains behind: breathtaking! Rhiannon & Alina created such a community where all levels of yogis felt comfortable and experienced a rewarding experience. We attended all of the varied and interesting workshops and become much more in touch with our inner spirits, (the self love workshop was revelational and we loved the sheer enjoyment of Estatic Dance at night around an open fire pit - one not to be missed). You’d imagine we couldn’t fit any more in, but there was a boat trip to a deserted beach; walks, wonderful massage and more! We stayed in thoughtfully constructed, very comfortable accommodation with spectacular views and everyday we were presented with a different gorgeous vegan buffet, prepared on site and sourced locally. All the staff were just wonderful. We’ve already booked to return next year!

b4c32016-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Mahakala is a place like no other. This hidden gem is located by the sea, sheltered by the mountains and lush forests. Eversince my arrival this sacred space felt like home to me and I feel blessed to stay for longer than I expected. The people around are their most authentic, open selves, which makes it really easy to be yourself. The workshops & classes are deeply healing and contain more wisdom than I could possibly contain. The vegan food is prepared lovingly by the kitchen staff, that makes you feel like a part of the family soon. All in all this place stole my heart. End of story. thank you xx

b4c32018-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I spent one week at Mahakala Center in September and it was the best Yoga Retreat I've ever joined Absolutely can recommend the food, the beautiful location and nature nearby, the group activities, the amazing teachers (it's beginner yoga so everyone is welcome) and the kind staff. Can't wait to come back next year!

b4c3201a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I love the fact that the centre offers a holistic approach to yoga. It respects the spirituality and mindfulness associated to it. From the place itself, to the yoga lessons, the workshops, the food and above all the people, everything transpires peace. It's more than a retreat - it's a journey. I also highly appreciated that there was diversity in the guests - from all genders, ages and backgrounds that really made us grow as a community. Our yoga teachers Rhiannon and Edita both created a safe space where we could be ourselves and learn together during our yoga sessions and meditation. The experience is also complemented by workshops around well-being and medicine through herbs that also enrich our connectivity to our body. I enjoy that the place is genuine with genuine people and not surfing on yoga as a trend.

b4c3201c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: I had a great stay at Mahakala Center. The yoga classes are awesome, the people are all super friendly and the food is great. Loved the location and everything. :) Hope to be back next year!

b4c3201e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Dear Mahakala, I would like to thank you all for a truly unforgettable experience, this was arguably one of the best weeks I have ever head. Both yoga teachers (Edita and Rhiannon) are very attentive, knowledgable and shining examples of teaching and guidance to be followed. Both of them adopt a slightly different approach which was (generally agreed on in our group, that ranged from novices to well advanced yogis) ultimately received as perfect combination since we all were able to benefit from both. These teachers are just amazing! Thank you, guys. Stefanie (an MD specialized in naturopathy) apparently knows almost everything there is to know about Traditional Chinese Medicine and all kinds of herbs around the world. Moreover, she was able to deliver interesting and valuable info in an easy-going fashion which was (and will be) beneficial for all the participants. The whole staff was taking a great care of us in general - cliff walks, boat tours and did I mention the best vegan food I have ever had Rooms and other parts of Mahakala retreat center are clean and cosy with nice touches there and there (chic pieces of decoration, hammocks, etc.) that further improved the whole impression of this place. And the view of the sea - you really need to see for yourself. The only downside was that the week had just passed way too quickly! I can (and will) totally recommend! 10 out of 10.

b4c32020-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The best retreat I’ve been to. Stunning mountainous views coupled with a clear ocean around 10-15min walk away. The center has a wonderfully lit shala with a terrace where we did yoga with magical views. Three aspects made this an unforgettable experience for me: 1) the yoga teachers, catering team and others were truly warm, caring and lovely people. 2) the yoga sessions were not just classes but wholesome experiences, with each day having a particular theme relating to mindfulness. I could feel my own progression both physically and mentally through the days 3) the experiences which I had during my stay at the centre, from gazing at the thousands of stars visible from the rooftop terrace; to going on an amazing boat trip to a private beach with clear warm waters; meaningful, heart warming, deep, fun and hilarious conversations with other guests and the team. Highly recommended. Thank you to the team.

b4c59100-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nette, schutter belegte Marina Marineros freundlich und hilfsbereit Sanitaranlagen in die Jahre gekommen, aber es gibt heisses Wasser. Boote fur kurzen Aufenthalt konnen langseits gehen! Gut bewacht Einfahrt ein wenig enterisch, also gut ad Wasser sehen! Umfeld ist hilfsbereit und freundlich!!! Gut zum Werken uber den Winter Vernunftige Apartments in Hafennahe ab € 200 - 250.-

b4c59102-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Bardzo fajne, klimatyczne miejsce w ktorym mozna wypic bardzo dobra kawe, zjesc pyszne lody oraz pozachwycac sie pieknym widokiem na Adriatyk.

b4c59106-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Шушањ је одлично мјесто за одмор и разоноду са много атракцоија и прелијепим плажама. Цјене нису пре високе тако да свима препоручујем да посјете овај град за сљедеће љеето.

b4c5910c-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Їда так собі. Позитивний момент це яхти не далеко від столиків. І все. Ну і плюс лишні євро до меню. Яхти як не як.

b4c59114-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Marina po svetskim standardima. Predivna za setnju i divljenje gigantskim kruzerima.

b4c7daf0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Niesamowite doswiadczenie :) wysmienite jedzenie, mila obsluga i klimatyczny wystroj.

b4c7daf2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The food was incredible, we visited for dinner on the first day of our holiday and enjoyed it so much that we returned for lunch the last day before our flight home. Very professional and kind service, prices were excellent for the high quality of the food. Lovely atmosphere, highly recommended!

b4c7daf8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Unfassbar leckeres Essen (hatten einmal das vegetarische Menu und einmal das Menu mit Fleisch). Die Bedienung war sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Das Ambiente hat uns auch super gefallen. Preis Leistung ist top. Ich bin froh dort gegessen zu haben und wurde es immer wieder machen. Ganz klare Empfehlung!!!

b4c7dafa-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: One of the best indian meals I ever ate. the waiter was very polite and friendly. he prepared an mini extradish for our little daughter. I can highly recommend it.

b4c7dafc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Excellent restaurant with traditional Indian food

b4c7db00-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The best meal out I have had in ages. Delicious, spotless and friendly. Lives up to the 5 start reviews.

b4c7db04-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Everything was very tasty, the staff was attentive to details and friendly, exciting interior. From the wishes - a menu with pictures, as it is impossible to figure it out without a waiter.

b4c7db08-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: We stumbled upon this restaurant on maps on our way back to the airport. A true Indian food experience (been there). There was not one single negative thing about 1,5 hours we spent there. People working there: 5 stars. If you don’t know what to eat, just let them help you. They don’t try to rip you off or anything, they just know what you need deep down inside. Taste: 5 stars. Every bite was good. We’ve never drank true masala tea out of India until now. Go there. Eat anything. There is nothing better to eat in Montenegro anyways.

b4c7db0a-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Authentic Indian cuisine This restaurant is amazing! I have tried many Inidans in The world and this is one of the best! The staff was amazingly nice and the food as well as the plates presentation was just wow! We had an amazing evening with a fast service. I would definitely recommend it.

b4c7db0e-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Magnifique restaurant, avec une terrasse splendide et une ambiance indienne ravissante. Les serveurs sont tres sympa avec une nourriture indienne excellente.

b4c7db10-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: This was the best restaurant in Montenegro for us. The cuisine is amazing!

b4c7db12-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Amazing food, great service with a nice garden. Will come back for sure!

b4ccbcf0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Don't recommend it Save your money

b4ccbcf2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Long ago this place was great for weekend parties, great number of local, regional and popular DJ s were here,so if you were lucky to visit Maximus from it's beginning ( if memory serves me right it was two or three years after y2k) was different,organised,even entering party was problem. As fan of Goa trance,best events were playing of Astral Projection... Maximus was really refreshing,lasers, dancers,spaces, accommodation for performers...one whole new level of performance started with Maximus. Must say that Old Town Kotor as the most beautiful and popular destination for tourists around the world was excellent choice for new hall of music. I have to mention that Old Town was for people who liked good music including new wave of electronic music as well as good old one. There were a few cafes like Scorpio,Fjaka, Portobello, Billiard club. I hope that some of them still work. If you are looking for new destination I can warmly recommend Kotor and Boka Kotorska ( Bay of Kotor) as one of the best places I ever been to and spent some great summers and New year's Eves that I'll always remember.

b4ccbcf6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: There s 100 tables on the dance floor.....whats the point!

b4ccbcf8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Sehr sehenswert Gute Restaurants in der Nahe

b4ccbcfc-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Very unpleasant staff. No dance area. Wouf Wouf

b4cf06e0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Hotel basico para estar cerca del puerto de bar

b4cf06e2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: SAS ambulans Montenegro Air Ambulance Ground Ambulance International Ambulance +905415331212

b4cf06e6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Вполне хорошая и сносная гостиница. Персонал конечно слабовато говорит по английски. Номера чистые и ухоженные. Не понравилось в номере не было ни то что софт дринков,а даже простой воды в бутылках. Вид из окна очень радовал .

b4cf06e8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Nisam bila u hotelu. Ne mogu da dam realnu ocenu. Prolazila sam pored hotela i nalazi se pored prometne saobracajnice.

b4cf06ea-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Frumos...restaurantul are o cafea de exceptie...printre altele.

b4cf06ec-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Hotel confortevole, ma come tutti i luoghi all'estero, dimentica la cucina Italiana

b4cf06f2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Odalar cok temiz, kucuk ve tertipli,ancak belki de ks donemi olmasndan, ingilizce bilen eleman restauranda yoktu, kahvalts cok yeyersiz...mumkunse baska bir otelde kaln...

b4cf06f6-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Pulito. Stanze grandi. Bagno abbastanza grande e soprattutto funziona tutto. Vicino al mare 1 km circa.

b4cf06f8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: По выходным проводят свадьбы. Музыка орет на полгорода.

b4d632d0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Doktori vrijedni postovanja,posao rade sa ljubavlju,posveceni ,strucni imaju najsavremeniju opremu,najbolji!

b4d632d4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: The best dental surgery in Podgorica. Amazing professionalism and kind people... there is no problem they cannot solve. They have integrity and this is extremely important for me also. I highly recommend them.

b4d632da-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Usluga, ljubaznost i naravno cika Perova duhovitost :)

b4d8a3d0-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Ljubazno naplacuju 50% vise za gost iz Srbije od cena u njihovom zvanicnom cenovniku.

b4d8a3d2-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Update : Епидемија е во цел свет не само во Црна Гора, второ , проверете денес околу 11ч дали ви работеше просторијата за тестирање на прв спрат Или сите беа доле на рецепција и се создаде огромна гужва внатре. И најлошо од се една вработена е за прием пациенти истата таа зема брис за ковид и дава инфузија на други пациенти и на крај внесува податоци во компјутер.!!! Најлоша услуга ,и редовни прегледи и ковид тестирање на едно место. Преголема гужва без ред и погрешни насоки и објаснување

b4d8a3d4-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Veoma profesionalni i pozrtvovani. Hvala im za pravovremenu i adekvatnu pomoc koju su pruzili.

b4d8a3d8-3a3f-11ec-85ae-912d2d9be135.message: Прекрасная больница в Будве, очень вежливый и квалифицированный персонал. Все очень быстро осмотр, анализы и лечение. Спасибо большое за оказанную помощь и лечение.
